content.rendered:
Custom 2019 Copa America Travel Packages

Witness the pinnacle of the South American football championship with a custom 2019 Copa America Finals Travel Package. Stay at one of Rio’s most iconic hotels, the Copacabana Palace; choose your preferred match day experience; and personalize your itinerary with any extras that will make your trip absolutely perfect.

Rio just may be the ultimate destination for a soccer travel experience. Flanked by scenic mountains and gorgeous beaches, Rio is a feast for the senses. It also happens to be home to some of the most passionate soccer fans on the planet, and a culture that has a great love for the beautiful game.

About the 2019 Copa America

The Copa America is an international men’s football tournament organized by South America’s soccer confederation. In 2019, this popular tournament will be held in Brazil, who recently hosted the world at the 2014 World Cup. The 2019 Copa America will involve 12 national teams: ten from South America and two invited teams, Japan and Qatar. Defending champs Chile have won the previous two Copa Americas and all eyes will be on them to see if they can pull off the three-peat.

Complete 2019 Copa America Finals packages available from $2,625 per person (based on double occupancy).
